name: San Francisco Community Empowerment and Support Group, Inc. (SFCEC)
description: The San Francisco Community Empowerment Center (SFCEC) is a non-profit community agency that advocates for people's basic needs and rights through their surrounding environments such as home life, employment situation, neighborhood and communities. SFCEC offers free classes in the following: ESL Citizen Preparation Tax Preparation Computer Skills Self Defense Dance Classes As needed classes for jobs

address: 2875 San Bruno Ave, San Francisco, CA, 94134
